sentences.sContent: Keep the caps on the bottles to prevent foreign bodies entering them (= objects that should not be there )
sentences.sCn: 瓶子要盖好，以免异物进入。

sentences.sContent: an operation to remove a foreign body (= sth that would not usually be there) from a wound
sentences.sCn: 从伤口摘除异物的手术

sentences.sContent: ...dragon boat racing is said to have begun on the eastern shores of Dongting lake as a search for the body of Qu Yuan...
...A growing body of evidence suggests that online reading may be less engaging and less satisfying...
...we believe that the greater body of evidence shows that school-sponsored sports programs appear to benefit students...
...Happiness may not be as good for the body as researchers thought...
...Many studies have noted the connection between a happy mind and a healthy body - the happier you are...
...Schweitzer concedes his research runs counter to a very large body of literature that commends the many benefits of goal-setting...
...These can be verbal cues or even body language...
...Its student body is less than 5% black and less than 2% Latino...
...The state recognizes this in the large body of family laws that govern children' welfare...
...What does the author think of America's large body of family laws governing children's welfare...

synos.tran: 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分

phrases.pCn: 主体，主要部分；主船体；机身
身体质量指数；体质指数；体质指数

words.tran: 整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式
赋…以形体；体现（body的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: 英文释义 an object that is separate from other objects
